summary: Feature request to implement workflow-local storage in PHP SDK - a static variable scoped to the current workflow execution, similar to thread-local or async-local patterns in other languages.
userImpact: Users can store and access workflow-local state without manually managing context or passing state through function parameters.
proposedFix: Implement a workflow-local variable mechanism in PHP SDK matching the pattern from other SDKs, as defined in temporalio/features#571.
keyQuote: Users need a static workflow-local var that is scoped only to the current workflow when accessed via code.
